mapper.select: select record.* ,rootDictionary.name as rootName ,parentDictionary.name as parentName ,grandDictionary.name as grandName from sys_dictionary as record LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as rootDictionary on record.root_id = rootDictionary.id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as parentDictionary on record.parent_id = parentDictionary.id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as grandDictionary on parentDictionary.parent_id = grandDictionary.id where record.id = #{id}

select record.* ,rootDictionary.name as rootName
,parentDictionary.name as parentName ,grandDictionary.name as grandName from sys_dictionary as record LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as rootDictionary on record.root_id = rootDictionary.id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as parentDictionary on record.parent_id = parentDictionary.id LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary as grandDictionary on parentDictionary.parent_id = grandDictionary.id
where record.is_delete = 0 and FIND_IN_SET(record.id,#{ids})
select * from sys_dictionary where is_delete = 0 and parent_id = #{parentId} order by sequence
select group_concat(value SEPARATOR '|') from sys_dictionary where is_delete = 0 and FIND_IN_SET(id,#{ids})
